body.name: ANRAN Solar Security Camera Outdoor, 5MP Security Camera Wireless Outdoor, Battery Powered Cam 2.4G WiFi 360° View Pan Tilt, with Alexa, Night Vision, PIR Human Detection, 2 Way Talk, IP65, SD/Cloud
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 39 mins
features: 5MP Crisp Image & 360° View——Solar Security camera take a 355° horizontally and 140° vertically panoramic shooting and make sure no blind spots or zone, Surveillance cameras show you everything in 5MP HD. Great IR night vision in darkness as well as 2.5K Color night vision enabled by 4 powerful spotlights.

100% security camera wireless and Solar Camera Outdoor——Solar Camera Outdoor runs on 2.4 GHz WiFi(not support 5G) and stays fully-charged with Anran Solar Panel which realize 100% security.Solar Security camera wireless with 9600mAh high-capacity battery, long-lasting power per charge and no worry about weather.

Real Solar Security Camera Outdoor——Adopt more sensitive digital PIR motion sensor, support Human/Active objects detection and instant alerts, event recording to micro SD card(Not included) and cloud(Requires a fee). You can also talk to or evict each other through the Solar security camera wireless.

Quick and Easy Setup——Security Camera wireless outdoor are easy to install both indoors and outdoors. With weatherproof certification, security camera outdoor never quits no matter in heavy rain or extreme sun. Scan the QR code with free Anran App to get started. The security camera outdoor can also work with Alexa connectivity, allowing for HD live view, arming and disarming the Surveillance cameras, and more.

Risk-free Purchase——US-Based cloud service (optional) with encrypted secure data and privacy protection. It's free to playback the cloud video of the past 7 days. 7*24 support and service via phone and email. 1-Year Warranty ensures this will quickly become your favorite no-risk purchase. Listen and talk interactively with your beloved ones, ward off would-be burglars when off-site.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pleased with the features and the app (UPDATE)
reviews.reviewText: This camera was a replacement for my 2 year old yi outdoor wifi plug in camera which stopped working completely after a software update.I unpacked the camera, put it in the sun for 15 minutes while connected to the solar panel. The power/reset/sd card are all under a removable rubber plug on the bottom of the camera. Powered it up. Followed the instructions and installed the app. There you are prompted for your wifi info. I had no issues.Easy mounting. Toss all the included screws and anchors in the trash. They will cause you needless frustration. I used 2 drywall screws to fasten the camera bracket to the bottom of a rafter tail under my eaves on the corner of the house facing south. Slide the camera on the rail and it clicks in place. 3 more drywall screws to fasten the detachable solar base to the fascia on the west side of my house around the corner. Then hand screw on the solar panel and adjust. Hand tighten nut. Done. Cord from panel to camera is plenty long. Maybe 6-8 feet. I used about a foot. Ziptied and tucked the rest. Everything seemed sturdy enough for high winds. There are a lot of features on this camera. Install the app on your phone. It operates them well. It displays wifi strength percentage and battery power percentage realtime. My camera gets about 75-80% approximately 50 feet away from the router thru the garage on an Xfinity router. More than I expected. Battery life seems more than adequate with the included solar panel. But we've had full sun so I'll watch that. The camera has numerous features. It has an optional siren. With a warning on the app stating it may annoy your neighbors. I don't use that. And haven't heard it. It has 2 regular lights which will illuminate a small area if you choose to use that option. Turn on/off with the light button on app. There is night vision B/W and night vision color which uses different lights. I use b/w. The picture quality is fine. I don't need night colors. Overall quality of picture is really good. On the app, you just drag your finger on the screen to rotate the camera. 360 degrees around. Probably 90 degrees vertical from horizon and going straight down. There is a paid AI function which will recognize packages and animals and people and differentiate. I use an SD card for storage. I formatted it on PC using slow format fat 32. Installed in camera. Pressed alerts, and camera prompted to reformat SD card. Took 2 times but then it started functioning. You can set alert zones and all kinds of notifications for everything. The first camera I ordered would not power on. I returned it and the second on powered right up and worked fine. There is an included window security camera sticker. I'll be happy if I can get at least 2 years out of this camera. I love the idea that it's soler and doesn't add on to the power bill. I like the Fullscreen option on the phone/ipad. Also to add a second phone/iPad to view the camera, you have to add a 'family member' to your 'family' it's kind of convoluted but I got it to work reliably. It takes a while to set it up and dial it in, but it's worth it. I'd recommend the purchase. I will update as necessary*UPDATEIt appears the plastic cover over the camera lens has turned cloudy around the outside. The picture is blurred. I've cleaned the lens several times with a microfiber cloth and even tried light Windex on the cloth. Nothing is changing. Used to be perfectly clear. Haven't had the camera very long. Hopefully it will not continue to cloud to the point of unusability. Will keep you posted.2nd UPDATE 1-7-23Lens has cleared up. Don't know how or why but the picture quality is back to normal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to set up and install, and it works great...
reviews.reviewText: I held off buying a security camera for a long time, since I have a few self-imposed restrictions. One, I don't mount anything on my exterior walls...they are stucco, and I think it weakens it to drill holes in it. Two, I don't want to hard wire anything or have to keep recharging it. Well, this camera solved both problems. I live where it snows, so as shown in the photos, I mounted the solar panel so it's almost vertical, and not at the recommended tilt angle. I also don't want snow building up on the mounting, so only the panel is exposed. The rest of the mount is attached to the soffit. No snow builds up on the panel. Same thing with the camera. I couldn't mount it where I wanted on the exterior of my trim due to the rain gutter, and I didn't want snow to build up on it, so I figured out how to mount it under the overhang. It works great there, and the camera is well protected.Pros - Very simple to install...straightforward instructions, even includes drilling templates if you need them. Setting up the app couldn't have been easier, took me about 5 minutes. Excellent picture quality, includes a zoom feature which I didn't know it had. The pan/tilt feature is really nice...I can look at my front porch then pan around and clearly see my fence/gate which is 200 feet away.Cons - Not really a con, but if you don't want (or can't) mount it flat on a wall, you'll have to fabricate a mount of some sort, as I did. I say it's not really a con because they can't be expected to anticipate every possible mounting scenario, and they do provide screws and screw anchors for standard mounting. I found nothing I would consider a con in regard to the use of the camera and the app.Customer Service - Excellent. I was concerned that my solar panel didn't seem to be charging the camera, so I emailed Anran. They got back to me in a couple of hours, and had suggestions to help me. I described what I did to set it up and they were very patient with my multiple emails. Problem solved and everything works fine now. And it wasn't a defect issue, just a minor adjustment with the cable.I now have two of these. Couldn't be happier, and I'll probably buy some more for gifts to neighbors and other friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great unless connecting to Alexa
reviews.reviewText: Picture and sound are great. Night vison is decent. I use this for monitoring my son and dogs in the backyard while I wfh. Connection via the app on my phone is great but the connection to Alexa is TRASH which is very disappointing since I bought it with the intention of using my Alexa show to watch them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Camera, Good Price!
reviews.reviewText: Simple set up, good quality, good customer service although it took a while.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars excellent security with easy set up and app navigation
reviews.reviewText: I love that I can keep an eye on things while im inside and have peace of mind while my kiddos play outside in the yard and while we go on family outings can check in and see if any new packages have been delivered and so on. Amazing quality in feed and photos. Alerts you of motion sensor crystal clear photos. Excellent night vision. Love that I can pan the camera around and tilt it from just the app. Love the 2 way voice feature. Wonderful for moms who need a peace of mind.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Camera for price
reviews.reviewText: Camera works great and was easy to set up. I enjoy all the amenities it's comes with and looking forward to purchasing more.
Remember to buy a mini SD card and you’re all set!App was easy, lots of adjustments for sensitivity.Get alerts and can check the back yard anywhere.

La telecamera funziona perfettamente anche con segnale wifi al 50%, il pannello ricarica anche in condizioni di nuvolosità.Molto robusta e di facile installazione. Ottima la possibilità di selezionare l'area in cui viene rilevato il movimento. Sono molto soddisfatto dell'acquisto e ne ho acquistata una seconda per coprire altre zone dell'abitazione

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Good quality and value for money, easy app interface.
reviews.reviewText: We have 3 of these covering our drive and garden and will be adding more to give more coverage. They are really good quality and work really well. The picture is really clear both day and night and the ability to have two way sound is a really good feature. You can receive notifications to your phone if the camera is activated. Requires a micro memory card in order to save recordings. The app interface is really intuitive and easy to set up and connect cameras. Its important to have a good wifi signal in the area you are installing. and need to ensure the solar panel is positioned to get good sun so it maintains the charge in duller weather. I would definitely recommend these cameras.

Ich habe mir die Kamera für den Einsatz in meinem Garten/Hinterhaus gekauft.Installation und Betrieb ging nach Anleitung flott. Ich nutze die Kamera seit über einem Jahr und ich bin sehr zufrieden. Der Akku ist groß dimensioniert und hält auch bei längerem bewölkten Wetter/im Winter ohne Probleme durch bis zum nächsten Tag.Die Bedienung mittels App ist,einfach und man kann mehrere Kameras in der App verwalten. Man sieht Videos bei Erkennung und man kann das Zeitfenster und den Alarm einstellen (Nur Licht und oder Sirene).Die Bildqualität ist gut und man kann über die App auch über den Lautsprecher der Kamera sprechen. Ideal wenn man im Urlaub ist, man sein Haus im Blich. Das Solarpanel hatte sich verabschiedet, der Verkäufer hat sehr schnell reagiert und für Abhilfe geschafft. Bei Fragen erfolgt eine schnelle Rückmeldung. Vorbildlich.Klare Kaufempfehlung.

reviews.reviewTitle: Bon produit, facile à installer et configurer.
reviews.reviewText: Bon produit, le seul problème lorsque je veux demander l'alarme de 22 heures à 7 heures, il me dit que l'heure de fin ne peut pas être avant l'heure du début. Obligé de commencer à 0 heures pour terminer à 7 heures. ???
